comments.raw_text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #578478 +++

Benjamin Smedberg [:bsmedberg] wrote in Bug 578478 Comment 31:
> Comment on attachment 546636 [diff] [details] [review]
> Synchronize xpidl.py with native xpidl

> I'm not sure how much of this is still needed, bug if it
> is please file a new bug for it to avoid confusion.

Currently, I have seen two problems on trunk:

1. MOZ_DEPRECATED is not being generated at all for methods
2. NS_DEPRECATED is being generated for attributes (should be MOZ_DEPRECATED)

As a result of #2, the build fails if you add [deprecated] to an attribute.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #578478 +++

Benjamin Smedberg [:bsmedberg] wrote in Bug 578478 Comment 31:
> Comment on attachment 546636 [diff] [details] [review]
> Synchronize xpidl.py with native xpidl

> I'm not sure how much of this is still needed, bug if it
> is please file a new bug for it to avoid confusion.

Currently, I have seen two problems on trunk:

1. MOZ_DEPRECATED is not being generated at all for methods
2. NS_DEPRECATED is being generated for attributes (should be MOZ_DEPRECATED)

As a result of #2, the build fails if you add [deprecated] to an attribute.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org

comments.text: Also, I didn't check if it handles deprecated classes correctly.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.raw_text: Also, I didn't check if it handles deprecated classes correctly.
